com.sales.utils

Class ProductBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sales.utils.ProductBuilder

  • public class ProductBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The ProductBuilder class is responsible for forming the product object, eaxh line contains the product data in file and the regex will retrieve quantity, name, price from input file. Also, based on the name of product, the Origin and Category is determined.
    Since:
    2019-Aug-04
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Abhishek

        public ProductBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • buildProduct

        public Product buildProduct(java.lang.String productString)
                     throws InvalidQuantityException,
                            InvalidAmountException,
                            InvalidInputException
        This method is used to build the Product Object. The quantity, name and price values are extracted based on regex match and the Imported type and Product category is calculated and set.
        Parameters:
        productString - This parameter is passed in form of '1 book at 12.49'
        Returns:
        This returns well formed Product based on input.
        Throws:
        InvalidQuantityException - If the quantity is less than zero
        InvalidAmountException - If the basePrice is less than zero
        InvalidInputException - If the receiptFile is not valid

      • findOriginType

        public OriginType findOriginType(java.lang.String name)
        This method is used to find the Origin Type of product. The Origin can either be DOMESTIC or IMPORTED, based on the name field containing imported word in it. Cannot Convert to lower case explicitly to handle the boundary case that application receives product name in upper case for IMPORTED or PILL because doing so will break test case e.g. CD is received in upper case
        Parameters:
        name - This parameter is passed in form of 'imported book'
        Returns:
        This returns OriginType [IMPORTED|DOMESTIC].

      • findCategory

        public Category findCategory(java.lang.String name)
        This method is used to find the category of product. The Category can be enum values of FOOD, MEDICINE, BOOK or OTHER, based on the name field containing chocolate, pill, book respectively it. Cannot Convert to lower case explicitly to handle the boundary case that application receives product name in upper case for IMPORTED or PILL because doing so will break test case e.g. CD is received in upper case
        Parameters:
        name - This parameter is passed in form of 'imported book'
        Returns:
        This returns OriginType [FOOD|MEDICINE|BOOK|OTHER].
